description: This file serves as the entry point for the production build of a Qwik-based application, specifically configured for Vite's preview command. It imports necessary modules, including the QwikCity middleware and SSR render functions, and exports the configured QwikCity adapter.

methods.name: createQwikCity
methods.description: Creates and configures the QwikCity middleware with specified options such as SSR render function and Qwik City plan.
